item.title: Debugging USB with TinyFPGA BX
item.description: I wanted to write a note on a quick debug session to get my TinyFPGA BX board working with my T450s running Debian Sid (unstable). The board doesn’t come with a separate USB controller (typically a FTDI chip or a microcontroller running a USB stack). Instead it loads a bootloader design from its QSPI flash which then presents a CDC class USB device to the host computer which shows up as a /dev/ttyACMn device.

item.title: Session Notes: The Lost Mine
item.description: Party Gregory. Human Cleric (Life) Aaravas. Half Elf. Paladin (Oath of the Ancients) Pio. Half Elf. Rogue (Arcane Trickster) Summary Date: 23 May 2021 It was one of our longer sessions (3 hours) and a few interesting events happened. Last session the party had arrived in Phandalin back from a daring stealth rescue mission. They had managed to infiltrate the Cragmaw tribe’s stronghold deep in the treacherous Neverwinter Wood and take out their leader, King Grol, while rescuing their friend Gundren Rockseeker.

item.title: Welcome (back)!
item.description: I have lost count of the number of times I’ve created a blog or a personal website of some kind over the years. While the last revision of this website did feature a journal, it has been a while since I’ve written regularly. I hope to fix that with this iteration. If you’re a returning reader, welcome back! The purpose of this blog, above all else, is to serve as a long-term memory for myself.

item.title: Reading List
item.description: 2021 Swords against Death (Fafhrd and Gray Mouser #2) - Fritz Leiber The Last Wish - Andrej Sapkowski Going Postal - Terry Pratchett 2020 The Black Company - Glen Cook 2019 Rocket Men - Robert Kurson 2018 Bad Blood - John Carreyrou The Three Body Problem - Cixin Liu The Emperor of All Maladies - Siddhartha Mukherjee Small Gods - Terry Pratchett 2016 Being Mortal - Atul Gawande 2015 Hiroshima - John Hershey The Man Who Knew Infinity - Robert Kanigel The Martian - Andy Weir
